entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
